attributes.action: Make the Referendum Decision Final - Out Means Out
attributes.additional_details:
A petition has been started trying to force a 2nd Referendum - this must not be allowed to happen. Out Must Mean Out
Britain is a democratic country & democracy has spoken, it should be respected.
attributes.background:
On the 23rd Of June 2016 the British Public voted on our membership of the European Union.

Britain Voted to Leave.
This Referendum result must stand.
Out Means Out.
